Package group10.server.repository

Interface MatchRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Match,​Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Match,​Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Match,​Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Match>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Match,​Long>
@Repository public interface MatchRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Match,​Long>
Repository that is used by MatchService. Allows communication with the database.
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay

    • findFirstByPlayerAndGameOrderByUpdateDateDesc

      Match findFirstByPlayerAndGameOrderByUpdateDateDesc​(Player player, Game game)
      Returns the most recent level of a Game that was played by the given Player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that played the level
      game - The game that was played
      Returns:
      Match The level

    • getScoreboard

      @Query(value="SELECT (l1.Score + 2 * l2.Score + 3 * l3.Score + 10 * l4.Score) AS Score, r.player_id AS UserId, p.username AS Username, l1.Score AS LevelOne, l2.Score AS LevelTwo, l3.Score AS LevelThree, l4.Score AS LevelFour FROM rounds r JOIN player p ON r.player_id = p.id JOIN (SELECT SUM(r.score) AS Score, r.player_id AS UserId FROM rounds r WHERE r.create_date >= TIMESTAMPADD(DAY, :days, NOW()) AND r.level = 1 GROUP BY r.player_id) l1 ON l1.UserId = r.player_id JOIN (SELECT SUM(r.score) AS Score, r.player_id AS UserId FROM rounds r WHERE r.create_date >= TIMESTAMPADD(DAY, :days, NOW()) AND r.level = 2 GROUP BY r.player_id) l2 ON l2.UserId = r.player_id JOIN (SELECT SUM(r.score) AS Score, r.player_id AS UserId FROM rounds r WHERE r.create_date >= TIMESTAMPADD(DAY, :days, NOW()) AND r.level = 3 GROUP BY r.player_id) l3 ON l3.UserId = r.player_id JOIN (SELECT SUM(r.score) AS Score, r.player_id AS UserId FROM rounds r WHERE r.create_date >= TIMESTAMPADD(DAY, :days, NOW()) AND r.level = 4 GROUP BY r.player_id) l4 ON l4.UserId = r.player_id WHERE r.create_date >= TIMESTAMPADD(DAY, :days, NOW()) GROUP BY r.player_id ORDER BY Score DESC ", countQuery="SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT SUM(r.score) AS Score, r.player_id AS UserId FROM rounds r WHERE r.create_date >= TIMESTAMPADD(DAY, :days, NOW()) GROUP BY r.player_id) k", nativeQuery=true) org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Scoreboard> getScoreboard​(@Param("days") int days, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Returns the scoreboard for the recent given days.
      Parameters:
      days - Number of days
      pageable - Pageable object for pagination
      Returns:
      Page of Scoreboard
